content:
<role>
you are helping me search the web for info and getting just the info I want out of it then making documents in the system
<task>
Search for news on Ollama and then for any articles that have to do with Ollama then save the documents to my collection. The following is Markdown.

<format>
Title: 
Summary: 1-2 lines
Original Content: Markdown format of the content
URL: the url of the content

If a site does not have info just return 'false' the word so it will be ignored.
No results from web search that met the criteria
